channel.title: CVE Feed for Contec Co., Ltd. -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Contec Co., Ltd. -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-20661|2024-08-03T17:45:45.234Z -- contec%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- solarview%20compact
item.description: Directory traversal vulnerability in SolarView Compact SV-CPT-MC310 prior to Ver.6.5 allows authenticated attackers to delete arbitrary files and/or directories on the server via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2021-20659|2024-08-03T17:45:45.371Z -- contec%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- solarview%20compact
item.description: SolarView Compact SV-CPT-MC310 prior to Ver.6.5 allows an authenticated attacker to upload arbitrary files via unspecified vectors. If the file is PHP script, an attacker may execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2022-44456|2024-08-03T13:54:03.678Z -- contec%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- conprosys%20hmi%20system%20%28chs%29
item.description: CONPROSYS HMI System (CHS) Ver.3.4.4?and earlier allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to execute an arbitrary OS command on the server where the product is running by sending a specially crafted request.

item.title: CVE-2021-20657|2024-08-03T17:45:45.172Z -- contec%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- solarview%20compact
item.description: Improper access control vulnerability in SolarView Compact SV-CPT-MC310 prior to Ver.6.5 allows an authenticated attacker to obtain and/or alter the setting information without the access privilege via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2021-20656|2024-08-03T17:45:45.117Z -- contec%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- solarview%20compact
item.description: Exposure of information through directory listing in SolarView Compact SV-CPT-MC310 prior to Ver.6.5 allows an authenticated attacker to obtain the information inside the system, such as directories and/or file configurations via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2021-20658|2024-08-03T17:45:45.391Z -- contec%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- solarview%20compact
item.description: SolarView Compact SV-CPT-MC310 prior to Ver.6.5 allows an attacker to execute arbitrary OS commands with the web server privilege via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2021-20660|2024-08-03T17:45:45.358Z -- contec%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- solarview%20compact
item.description: Cross-site scripting vulnerability in SolarView Compact SV-CPT-MC310 prior to Ver.6.5 allows an attacker to inject an arbitrary script via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2022-35239|2024-08-03T09:29:17.446Z -- contec%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- solarview%20compact
item.description: The image file management page of SolarView Compact SV-CPT-MC310 Ver.7.23 and earlier, and SV-CPT-MC310F Ver.7.23 and earlier contains an insufficient verification vulnerability when uploading files. If this vulnerability is exploited, arbitrary PHP code may be executed if a remote authenticated attacker uploads a specially crafted PHP file.

item.title: CVE-2021-20662|2024-08-03T17:45:45.501Z -- contec%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- solarview%20compact
item.description: Missing authentication for critical function in SolarView Compact SV-CPT-MC310 prior to Ver.6.5 allows an attacker to alter the setting information without the access privileges via unspecified vectors.
